00063 #define orxLERP(A, B, T)          ((A) + ((T) * ((B) - (A))))

00071 #define orxMIN(A, B)              (((A) > (B)) ? (B) : (A))
00072 
00078 #define orxMAX(A, B)              (((A) < (B)) ? (B) : (A))

00086 #define orxCLAMP(V, MIN, MAX)     orxMAX(orxMIN(V, MAX), MIN)
00087 
00094 #define orxCIRCULAR_CLAMP_INC_MIN(V, MIN, MAX)  \
00095 do                                              \
00096 {                                               \
00097   while((V) < (MIN))                            \
00098   {                                             \
00099     (V) += ((MAX) - (MIN));                     \
00100   }                                             \
00101   while((V) >= (MAX))                           \
00102   {                                             \
00103     (V) -= ((MAX) - (MIN));                     \
00104   }                                             \
00105 } while(orxFALSE)
00106 
00113 #define orxCIRCULAR_CLAMP_INC_MAX(V, MIN, MAX)  \
00114 do                                              \
00115 {                                               \
00116   while((V) <= (MIN))                           \
00117   {                                             \
00118     (V) += ((MAX) - (MIN));                     \
00119   }                                             \
00120   while((V) > (MAX))                            \
00121   {                                             \
00122     (V) -= ((MAX) - (MIN));                     \
00123   }                                             \
00124 } while(orxFALSE)

00186 static orxINLINE orxU32 orxMath_GetBitCount(orxU32 _u32Value)
00187 {
00188   _u32Value -= ((_u32Value >> 1) & 0x55555555);
00189   _u32Value = (((_u32Value >> 2) & 0x33333333) + (_u32Value & 0x33333333));
00190   _u32Value = (((_u32Value >> 4) + _u32Value) & 0x0f0f0f0f);
00191   _u32Value += (_u32Value >> 8);
00192   _u32Value += (_u32Value >> 16);
00193   return(_u32Value & 0x0000003f);
00194 }
00195 
00200 static orxINLINE orxU32 orxMath_GetTrailingZeroCount(orxU32 _u32Value)
00201 {
00202   /* De Bruijn multiply look up table */
00203   static const orxU32 sau32DeBruijnLUT[32] = 
00204   {
00205     0, 1, 28, 2, 29, 14, 24, 3, 30, 22, 20, 15, 25, 17, 4, 8, 
00206     31, 27, 13, 23, 21, 19, 16, 7, 26, 12, 18, 6, 11, 5, 10, 9
00207   };
00208 
00209   /* Done! */
00210   return sau32DeBruijnLUT[((orxU32)(((orxS32)_u32Value & -(orxS32)_u32Value) * 0x077CB531U)) >> 27];
00211 }

00217 static orxINLINE orxBOOL orxMath_IsPowerOfTwo(orxU32 _u32Value)
00218 {
00219   orxBOOL bResult;
00220 
00221   /* Updates result */
00222   bResult = ((_u32Value & (_u32Value - 1)) == 0) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE;
00223   
00224   /* Done! */
00225   return bResult;
00226 }
00227 
00232 static orxINLINE orxU32 orxMath_GetNextPowerOfTwo(orxU32 _u32Value)
00233 {
00234   orxU32 u32Result;
00235 
00236   /* Non-zero? */
00237   if(_u32Value != 0)
00238   {
00239     /* Updates result */
00240     u32Result = _u32Value - 1;
00241     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 1);
00242     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 2);
00243     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 4);
00244     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 8);
00245     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 16);
00246     u32Result++;
00247   }
00248   else
00249   {
00250     /* Updates result */
00251     u32Result = 1;
00252   }
00253   
00254   /* Done! */
00255   return u32Result;
00256 }

00264 static orxINLINE orxFLOAT orxMath_SmoothStep(orxFLOAT _fMin, orxFLOAT _fMax, orxFLOAT _fValue)
00265 {
00266   orxFLOAT fTemp, fResult;
00267 
00268   /* Gets normalized and clamped value */
00269   fTemp = (_fValue - _fMin) / (_fMax - _fMin);
00270   fTemp = orxCLAMP(fTemp, orxFLOAT_0, orxFLOAT_1);
00271 
00272   /* Gets smoothed result */
00273   fResult = fTemp * fTemp * (orx2F(3.0f) - (orx2F(2.0f) * fTemp));
00274 
00275   /* Done! */
00276   return fResult;
00277 }
00278 
00285 static orxINLINE orxFLOAT orxMath_SmootherStep(orxFLOAT _fMin, orxFLOAT _fMax, orxFLOAT _fValue)
00286 {
00287   orxFLOAT fTemp, fResult;
00288 
00289   /* Gets normalized and clamped value */
00290   fTemp = (_fValue - _fMin) / (_fMax - _fMin);
00291   fTemp = orxCLAMP(fTemp, orxFLOAT_0, orxFLOAT_1);
00292 
00293   /* Gets smoothed result */
00294   fResult = fTemp * fTemp * fTemp * (fTemp * ((fTemp * orx2F(6.0f)) - orx2F(15.0f)) + orx2F(10.0f));
00295 
00296   /* Done! */
00297   return fResult;
00298 }

00521 static orxINLINE orxFLOAT    orxMath_Round(orxFLOAT _fOp)
00522 {
00523   register orxFLOAT fResult;
00524 
00525 #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00526 
00527   /* Updates result */
00528   fResult = (fmodf(_fOp, orxFLOAT_1) >= orx2F(0.5f)) ? ceilf(_fOp) : floorf(_fOp);
00529 
00530 #else /* __orxMSVC__ */
00531 
00532   /* Updates result */
00533   fResult = rintf(_fOp);
00534 
00535 #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00536 
00537   /* Done! */
00538   return fResult;
00539 }
